name: SensoFox
0:
”Alexa, open smart fox”
”turn on light in bedroom”
”set light to twenty percent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart fox
des: That's a skill that controls our companies' smart home devices using firebase alongside with our application. This is for SensoFox smart home company customers and alexa users to be able to control our devices using alexa devices.
